title: shopease
description:
Shopease is a powerful e-commerce platform designed to give you full control. Built from scratch with a robust backend Spring and a responsive frontend crafted with Angular, Shopease ensures a smooth, secure, and scalable shopping experience.
This listing includes a non-exclusive license agreement, allowing the buyer to use the application. The seller retains the right to sell licenses to other buyers. Please refer to the attached license agreement document for detailed terms and conditions.
